Translations.Text: Yara imana eneche o satkaja karache allah abasya'i tadera prabesa karabena sbargodyana samuhe yadera nica diye baye cale jharanaraji, sekhane tadera bhusita kara habe sonara kankana o mani-mukto diye. Ara sekhane tadera posaka-paricchada habe resamera.
Ara tadera paricalita kara hayeche pabitra bakyalapera prati, ara tadera caliye ne'oya hayeche prasansita pathe.

Nihsandeha yara abisbasa posana kare ara thekiye rakhe allahâ€Œra patha theke o pabitra masajida theke yake amara baniyechi sakala manusera jan'ya samanabhabe, -- sekhanakara basindara o bahiragatera jan'ya. Ara ye ke'u sekhane an'yayabhabe dhurtami karate caya take amara asbada karara marmantada sasti theke.
